entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.summary: Rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
